mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POSTS (postNo, userNo, postRegDate, postTitle, postContent, postHit, postImg) VALUES(seq_post_no.nextval, #{userNo}, SYSDATE, #{postTitle}, #{postContent}, 0, #{postImg})
mapper.select: SELECT p.postNo, p.userNo, p.postTitle, p.postContent, p.postRegDate, p.postHit, p.postImg, (SELECT count(postlikedNo) FROM postliked WHERE postNo = p.postNo) as liked FROM posts p

SELECT p.postNo, p.userNo, u.userName, p.postTitle, p.postContent, p.postRegDate, p.postHit, p.postImg, (SELECT count(postlikedNo) FROM postliked WHERE postNo = p.postNo) AS liked, (SELECT count(postlikedNo) FROM postliked WHERE postNo = p.postNo AND userNo=#{userNo}) AS likedByAuth FROM posts p join users u ON p.userNo = u.userNo WHERE p.userno IN (SELECT relationTo FROM userrelation WHERE relationFrom=#{userNo} AND relationType=0) ORDER BY p.postRegDate DESC

SELECT p.postNo, p.userNo, u.userName, p.postTitle, p.postContent, p.postRegDate, p.postHit, p.postImg, (SELECT count(postlikedNo) FROM postliked WHERE postNo = p.postNo) AS liked, (SELECT count(postlikedNo) FROM postliked WHERE postNo = p.postNo AND userNo=#{userNo}) AS likedByAuth FROM posts p join users u ON p.userNo = u.userNo WHERE p.postNo = #{postNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO postliked (postLikedNo, postNo, userNo) VALUES(seq_liked_no.nextval, #{postNo}, #{userNo})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM postliked WHERE postNo = #{postNo} AND userNo = #{userNo}
